name: Olive Adventure
description:
(This was everyone's first experience with a game jam and we all had a lot of fun.)

All assets in use were created by members of the team during the period of the game jam, which consisted of:

Technical/System Design/Programming: Sevithian (@Seth#9999)

Art Assets and Visual Design: JacksonD (@JacksonD#1806)

Sound and Music Design: PseudoNym (@Zweistar#1987)
